com.percussion.workflow.mail
Interface IPSMailProgram

public interface IPSMailProgram

Rhythmyx workflow engine uses javax mail to send mail notifications for the workflow by default. However, one can use a custom mail program (a plugin) instead of javax API. In that case the plugin needs implement this interface to use a custom mail API. Following are the steps invloved in using custom mail program for Rhythmyx workflow:

  • Write your own class implementing this interface. e.g. com.percussion.PSMailProgramJavax
  • Register this class with the Rhythmyx workflow engine. This is done by making an entry in rxworkflow.properties file for the variable CUSTOM_MAIL_CLASS, as for example:
    ...
    CUSTOM_MAIL_CLASS=com.percussion.PSMailProgramJavax
    ...

Method Summary
 void init()
          This method can be used to initialize the mail program.
 void sendMessage(IPSMailMessageContext mesageContext)
          This is the method that must be implemented by the implementing class (plugin) that should actually send the message as per the data supplied via IPSMailMessageContext object.
 void terminate()
          This method can be used to cleanup the resources used by the mail program.
 

Method Detail

init

void init()
          throws PSMailException
This method can be used to initialize the mail program. Called by workflow engine only once in the Object's life time.

Throws:
PSMailException - when initialization of the mail program fails.

sendMessage

void sendMessage(IPSMailMessageContext mesageContext)
                 throws PSMailException
This is the method that must be implemented by the implementing class (plugin) that should actually send the message as per the data supplied via IPSMailMessageContext object.

Parameters:
mesageContext - object storing all the data required for sending the mail. Never be null.
Throws:
PSMailException - when message cannnot be sent for any reason.

terminate

void terminate()
               throws PSMailException
This method can be used to cleanup the resources used by the mail program. Workflow engine calls this method just before this object looses its scope (before its death).

Throws:
PSMailException - when termination is smooth.
